content: I have a D8 project running, I've been working on it yesterday... sooo good to come back to my Backdrop projects today. D8 is for platforms, not for websites. Spent a looong time to install a module via composer. Most modules install without problems, but the ones who do not drive you crazy.
Hopefully it's well paid. All D8 projects should be :wink:
Unfortunately not enough, I did not expect that amount of problems;-)
@indigoxela not D8 related, but... watch out for projects currently based on Contao CMS, I have met several companies who are really looking for an alternative solution with better UX.

D8 is for platforms, not for websites.

...so true :+1:
